description: This unit prepares students to enter the profession. They continue to develop their ability to become reflective professionals monitoring their own thoughts and actions. They gain an understanding of employment opportunities, processes and organisational and work conditions. Students gain an appreciation for the importance of emotional, physical, social and spiritual wellbeing. They learn strategies to balance work and life commitments. They have a conscious understanding of themselves as professionals, their relationships with others and the importance of continuing their professional learning.
